content:
本文展示瞭如何使用 alert shortcode。
1{{< alert "Message" [type] >}}  The parameter type is optional. Default to info.
 Info 1{{< alert "Info" >}} 1$ curl https://test.com 2$ openshift-install Info  Success 1{{< alert "Success" success >}} Success  Warning 1{{< alert "Warning" warning >}} Warning  Danger 1{{< alert "Danger" danger >}} Danger
title: Alert Shortcode
